data.actual_result: The content of the message I wanted to edit is still in the textbox but I'm no longer in Edit mode
data.expected_result: I should be able to continue editing my message in channel A
data.short_description: If you edit a message while you were already editing another message in another channel, the Edit mode will be lost upon going back to that channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to channel A - Send a message - Long press and Edit - While you're in Edit mode, switch to channel B - Send message - Long press and Edit - Go back to channel A
